description: This file implements a set of placeholder functions for cryptographic public key operations, including key requests, matching, signing, and verification, mainly returning failure status and unreferenced parameters.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscCryptoPubRequest(ANSC_CRYPTO_PUB_ALGORITHM Algorithm,ANSC_CRYPTO_PUB_OPERATION Operation,ANSC_HANDLE hParams,ANSC_CRYPTO_FIN_CALLBACK FinishCB,ANSC_HANDLE hFinishCBParam)
methods.description: Issues a cryptographic public key request, currently unimplemented and returns failure.

methods.name: BOOL AnscCryptoPubKeyPairMatch(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_CRYPTO_PUB_KEY_TYPE KeyType,ANSC_HANDLE hPublicKey,ANSC_HANDLE hPrivateKey)
methods.description: Checks if a public/private key pair matches, currently always returns false.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscCryptoPubKeyRSASign(int nHashMethod,PVOID pDataToSign,ULONG ulSizeOfData,PVOID pSignature,PULONG pulSizeOfSignature,PANSC_CRYPTO_PUB_KEY_PARAMS pParams)
methods.description: Performs RSA signing, currently unimplemented and returns failure.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscCryptoPubKeyRSAVerify(int nHashMethod,PVOID pDataToVerify,ULONG ulSizeOfData,PVOID pSignature,ULONG ulSizeOfSignature,PANSC_CRYPTO_PUB_KEY_PARAMS pParams)
methods.description: Performs RSA signature verification, currently unimplemented and returns failure.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscCryptoPubKeyDSASign(int nHashMethod,PVOID pDataToSign,ULONG ulSizeOfData,PVOID pSignature,PULONG pulSizeOfSignature,PANSC_CRYPTO_PUB_KEY_PARAMS pParams)
methods.description: Performs DSA signing, currently unimplemented and returns failure.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscCryptoPubKeyDSAVerify(int nHashMethod,PVOID pDataToVerify,ULONG ulSizeOfData,PVOID pSignature,ULONG ulSizeOfSignature,PANSC_CRYPTO_PUB_KEY_PARAMS pParams)
methods.description: Performs DSA signature verification, currently unimplemented and returns failure.
